site_name: Land At South East Junction Of Douro Street And Fairfield Road, Douro Street, London
description: Application for variation of condition 2 (Approved plans) of planning permission dated 01/02/2016, ref: PA/15/03049, which gave permission for: Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of the site to provide a residential development, comprising the erection of part 2 to 3 storey building to provide nine dwellings (three houses and six flats), cycle parking, refuse/recycling facilities and access together with landscaping including communal and private amenity space. Amendments sought: Amendments to internal layouts. Reduction in height of houses HR1-HR3 to align with massing of adjacent flats R1-R6. Amendments to windows on west, north and east elevations. Removal of lower ground accommodation. Adjustments to terraces.
